relationships.description: Dumbledore left signs for Harry to decipher, as mentioned in the text.
The Resurrection Stone is hidden in the golden Snitch, which Harry believes Dumbledore left for him.
You-Know-Who is death, as mentioned by Hermione and Harry's quote.
Harry finds the mystery of the silver doe less important than his own concerns.
Ron and Hermione are discussing the mystery of the silver doe, as mentioned in the text.
